recipesJson.name: Chocolate Cookie Cereal
recipesJson.author: RUG_ly
recipesJson.description:
CAP Cereal 27, FA Meringue and FW Yogurt make a great cereal with milk base for you to build whatever profile you like on top of.

CAP Sugar Cookie blends in nicely with Cereal 27 to make a nice cookie cereal.

MB Glamour Chocolate to give just a hint of chocolate chips.

I sweeten with 0.5% CAP Super Sweet.

Watch the Video Here:
https://youtu.be/LCOwXKOyuwU
